Claim: "The idea of'settled science' defies the history of science."
Implication: "Repeated upheavals of previous forms of'settled science' have occurred in the history of science."
Referring expressions: The idea, settled science, history of science.  previous forms of settled science, history of science.
Formula: (exists c (exists a (IsSettled(c) and IsHistoryOfScience(a)))) -> (exists d (exists a (HasRepeatedUpheaval(d) and IsHistoryOfScience(a))))
